alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 3:33AM EST until February 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northern New York and most of Vermont. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult during this morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will taper off to light wintry mix this morning. Additional light snow and ice accumulation is expected through tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex
